title: Definition:Logical Not
definition:
The logical not or (logical) negation operator is a unary connective whose action is to reverse the truth value of the statement on which it operates.

:p is defined as:
:p is not true
:It is not the case that p is true
:It is false that p
:p is false.


Thus the statement p is called the negation of p.


p is voiced not p.

title: Definition:Content of Polynomial
definition:
=== Integer Polynomial ===
Let f âˆˆâ„¤[ X ] be a polynomial with integer coefficients.

Then the content of f, denoted cont( f ), is the greatest common divisor of the coefficients of f.

=== Rational Polynomial ===
Let f âˆˆâ„š[ X ] be a polynomial with rational coefficients.


The content of f is defined as:
:cont( f ) := cont( n f )  n
where n âˆˆâ„• is such that n f âˆˆâ„¤[ X ].

=== Polynomial in GCD Domain ===
Let D be a GCD domain.

Let K be the field of quotients of D.

Let f âˆˆ K [ X ] be a polynomial.

Let a âˆˆ D be such that a f âˆˆ D [ X ].

Let d be the greatest common divisor of the coefficients of a f.

Then we define the content of f to be:
:cont( f ) :=  d a

title: Definition:Like Vector Quantities
definition:
Let ğš and ğ› be vector quantities.

Then ğš and ğ› are known as like vector quantities  if and only if  they have the same direction.

title: Definition:Electric Charge/Polarity/Like
definition:
If 2 electric charges are of the same polarity, they are referred to as being like (electric) charges.


The usage is archaic; the word one would expect is alike.

title: Definition:Polygon/Internal Angle
definition: The internal angle of a vertex of a polygon is the size of the angle between the sides adjacent to that vertex, as measured inside the polygon.

title: Definition:Transversal (Geometry)/Interior Angle
